++ Git How To Create A Branch

+++ SUMMARY

  * GitCommandBranch
    
  * create a new copy of code base of branch youre currently on:
    * git branch new_branch
    
  * see existing branches to confirm you created a branch:
    * git branch
  
  * switch to your new branch using GitCommandCheckout 
    * git checkout new_branch
